mapper.insert: insert into group_members (id, groupId, memberId, displayName, role, isDeleted, groupNickname, region, phone, WeChat, Alipay, memberDesc, timestamp, createdAt, updatedAt) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{groupNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weChat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ) on duplicate key update id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, groupId = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memberId = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, displayName = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isDeleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, groupNickname = #{groupNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WeChat = #{weChat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Alipay = #{alipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memberDesc = #{memberDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createdAt = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatedAt = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

insert into group_members (id, groupId, memberId, displayName, role, isDeleted, groupNickname, region, phone, WeChat, Alipay, memberDesc, timestamp, createdAt, updatedAt) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{item.groupNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.weChat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.alipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.memberDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.timestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
on duplicate key update id = values(id), groupId = values(groupId), memberId = values(memberId), displayName = values(displayName), role = values(role), isDeleted = values(isDeleted), groupNickname = values(groupNickname), region = values(region), phone = values(phone), WeChat = values(WeChat), Alipay = values(Alipay), memberDesc = values(memberDesc), timestamp = values(timestamp), createdAt = values(createdAt), updatedAt = values(updatedAt)
